duties_responsibilities.duty: Establish and maintain communications among all project/programs stakeholders.
Plan the project (s) assigned to, including scope, schedule, cost, safety, and quality aspect of the project.
Execute projects according to Plan within designed scope, cost, and schedule limits.
Create, develop, and deliver project/business case presentations to Senior Management/project sponsors.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science degree in Engineering, Construction Management, or equivalent technical field.
